mapper.select: select id, usercode, username, `password`, salt, locked, realName, pid, openbank, cardNo, phoneNo, email, `role`, address, lastlogtime, recommendNo, regtime, threezhifu, wttz, passState, ticket, open_id, manager from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
